name: Beast
description: A father and his two teenage daughters find themselves hunted by a massive rogue lion intent on proving that the Savanna has but one apex predator.

review.author: iammustaf_a
review.heading: Entertaining
review.reviewBody: I watched this in 4DX, with moving chairs and extra immersion techniques in the theater. It was fun and mindlessly entertaining. Good to watch on a summer weekend where there's nothing else to do. I'd watch it again on TV. Also, I feel Idris Elba starred in this movie purely to solidify his chances for Bond. He's made this movie well worth it.

keywords: survival adventure,lion,game reserve,one word title,south africa
